title: LTTE system of duplicating London Bank Cards And Robbing Bank Accounts now in Tamil Nadu
content: – By Walter Jayawardhana – A fraud of duplicating  Bank cards and robbing customers of  their deposits in their accounts very similar  to what was practiced by the LTTE sympathizers at London petrol stations where customers used to buy using their credit cards has been detected in the Tamil Nadu city of Madurai recently according…
